paper_abstract: A decentralized feedback control scheme is proposed to synchronize linearly coupled identical neural networks with time-varying delay and parameter uncertainties. Sufficient condition for synchronization is developed by carefully investigating the uncertain nonlinear synchronization error dynamics in this article. A procedure for designing a decentralized synchronization controller is proposed using linear matrix inequality (LMI) technique. The designed controller can drive the synchronization error to zero and overcome disruption caused by system uncertainty and external disturbance.
paper_title: Maintaining synchronization by decentralized feedback control in time delay neural networks with parameter uncertainties
